item.title: California suing Trump to stop his 'unlawful' tariffs
item.description: Trump's tariffs have whipped up historic market volatility and frayed America's relationships with its allies and trading partners.

item.title: Trump 'looking into' legality of deporting U.S. citizens to foreign prisons, White House says
item.description: The Trump administration has already deported hundreds of alleged members of a Venezuelan gang from the U.S. to El Salvador, where they are in prison.

item.title: The European Union braces for more U.S. tariffs despite talks

item.title: AOC fundraising soars as the New York rep and Bernie Sanders barnstorm U.S. against Trump
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has become a leading face of the Democratic Party's resistance to the Trump administration, drawing crowds nationwide.

item.title: Judge orders Trump officials to testify about efforts to return wrongly deported man
